com.powerup.gui

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.powerup.gui.Window

  • public class Window
extends Object
    Contains all methods that update the GUI.
    Since:
    2014-02-13
    Author:
    Oliver Lewisohn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Window(Game game, GameFrame gFrame)
      Creates a new window.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activateTileListener()
      Activates the listener that allows tiles to be played to the board.
      void deactivateTileListener()
      Deactivates the listener that allows tiles to be played to the board.
      void disableAllButtons()
      Disables all buttons (except "New game") in the command panel.
      JFrame getFrame()

      Shows the dialog that allows a player to choose which company is created.

      Shows the dialog that asks a player to choose the order of takeovers.

      Shows the results dialog at the end of the game.
      void showStockMarketDialog()
      Shows the stock market dialog, where shares can be bought.

      Shows the dialog that asks a player which company should survive a merger.

      Updates the board display.

      Updates the information panel to show whose turn it is.
      void write(String string)
      Writes a new line to the information panel.
      void writeln(String string)
      Writes a new line to the information panel, followed by a blank line.
      void writepn(String string)
      Writes a new line to the information panel, preceded by a blank line.

        public Window(Game game,
      GameFrame gFrame)
        Creates a new window.
        Parameters:

        gFrame - The game's primary frame.

    • Method Detail

      • activateTileListener

        public void activateTileListener()
        Activates the listener that allows tiles to be played to the board.

      • deactivateTileListener

        public void deactivateTileListener()
        Deactivates the listener that allows tiles to be played to the board.

      • disableAllButtons

        public void disableAllButtons()
        Disables all buttons (except "New game") in the command panel.

      • getFrame

        public JFrame getFrame()

      • showCreateCompanyDialog

        public Company showCreateCompanyDialog()
        Shows the dialog that allows a player to choose which company is created.
        Returns:
        The company chosen by the player.

      • showOrderDialog

        public Company showOrderDialog(ArrayList<Company> companies)
        Shows the dialog that asks a player to choose the order of takeovers.
        Parameters:
        companies - A list of companies which can be taken over.
        Returns:
        The company selected.

      • showResultsDialog

        public void showResultsDialog()
        Shows the results dialog at the end of the game.

      • showStockMarketDialog

        public void showStockMarketDialog()
        Shows the stock market dialog, where shares can be bought.

      • showSurvivorDialog

        public Company showSurvivorDialog(ArrayList<Company> companies)
        Shows the dialog that asks a player which company should survive a merger.

        This is only necessary when two or more companies are the same size.

        Parameters:
        companies - The list of companies involved in the merger.
        Returns:
        The company selected.

      • update

        public void update(Player activePlayer,
          int actions,
          int startActions,
          boolean tilePlayed)
        Updates everything in the game window.
        Parameters:
        activePlayer - The currently active player.
        actions - The number of actions the player has in the current turn.
        startActions - The number of actions the player had at the start of their turn.
        tilePlayed - True if a tile has been played on the player's current turn, otherwise false.

      • updateBoard

        public void updateBoard()
        Updates the board display.

      • updateInfoPanel

        public void updateInfoPanel(String string)
        Updates the information panel to show whose turn it is.
        Parameters:
        string - The new title of the information panel.

      • write

        public void write(String string)
        Writes a new line to the information panel.
        Parameters:
        string - The line to be written.

      • writeln

        public void writeln(String string)
        Writes a new line to the information panel, followed by a blank line.
        Parameters:
        string - The line to be written.

      • writepn

        public void writepn(String string)
        Writes a new line to the information panel, preceded by a blank line.
        Parameters:
        string - The line to be written.
